skad ces smras so/ /kye khyed ci zhig gi phyir 'thab cing rtsod par gyur/ de nas mi de gnyis langs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po gsan du gsol/ bdag cag la ni sa phyogs cung zad kyang ma mchis kyi sa g.yar po zhig la shing bskyed pa las rlung gis

bskyod nas rtsa ba yang ma zug lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu yang ma byung ste/ rgyal po chen po de'i rtsa ba dpag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu yang mchis pa dang / khyod kyis nyes so zhes mi 'dis bdag la thab mo brgal du bas kyi bdag gis ni ma nongs na lha de la bdag gis cung zad kyang

ma nongs par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas rgyal po des blon po bye ba phrag sum cu bkug ste/ bsogs nas 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /khyed cag smros shig /blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ ji skad smra bar bgyi/ gang gi nyin mo shing bskyed pa de nyid kyi nyin mo rtsa ba zug nas lo ma

dang me tog dang 'bras bu 'byung ba de khyed kyis gang na yang mthong ngam/ thos sam khyed kyis zhag bdun nam zla phyed kyis 'di bye brag phyed par gyis shig /de nas blon po de dag stan las langs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rgyal po chen po bdag cag gis 'di bye brag phyed par bgyir

mi rung ngo / /'di bye brag phyed par rngo mi thogs so/ /rgyal po chen po 'di ni ngo mtshar te/ re shig mi 'di nyid la rma bar bgyi'o/ /kye skyes bu gang smras pa'i don bden nam smros shig /smras pa rgyal po chen po don de mad do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi nyin mo shing bskyed pa/ /de yi nyin

mo rtsa zug cing / /'dab ma me tog 'bras byung zhes/ /de nyid nyin mo smra ba ni/ /khyod kyi tshig 'di 'thad par dka'/ /'di 'dra mthong ba'am thos pa med/ /de nas mi des thal sbyar te/ /rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/ /gshegs la nyid kyis shing bskyed de/ /rtsa ba zug la gzigs

su gsol/ /de nas rgyal po de blon po bye ba phrag sum cu dang lhan cig phyi rol tu byung nas mi de gnyis kyang btson rar bcug go/ /de nas rgyal po de nyid kyis shing bskyed pa dang / shing de rtsa ba yang ma zug /lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu yang ma byung nas de nas rgyal po de khros te 'di skad

ces khyed myur du deng la shing gshegs pa'i sta re rnams long shig /ces smras nas blangs pa dang / de nas gang mi des bskyed pa'i shing de la khros nas shing de'i lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu byung ba rnams bcad de shing gcig po de bcad pa dang shing bcu gnyis byung ngo / /shing bcu gnyis po

bcad pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtsa ba dang bcas/ lo ma dang bcas/ myu gu dang bcas pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ngo / /de nas shing nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag las bya gser gyi ze ba can/ gser gyi mchu can/ rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab ma can nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po

de khro ba'i zil gyis non nas rang gi lag gis sta re blangs te shing de la gtsabs pa dang / shing gtsabs pa de las bdud rtsi'i chu byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po de yid mi bde nas song la mi de gnyis btson ra nas phyung shig ces bsgo ba dang / lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes de'i mod la rab tu brgyugs te/

mi de gnyis btson ra nas phyung nas shing ga la ba der khrid pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shing gcig bcad pa gnyis gyur du 'phel te nyi shu rtsa bzhir gyur pa de khyed kyis bskyed dam/ ngas bskyed pa'i shing ni rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu yang ma skyes so/ /de nas mi des

gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag gi bsod nams ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i bsod nams khyod la mi mnga'o/ /de nas blon po bye ba phrag sum cus pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs nas mi de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po snga ma 'di ni mi rung gis khyod kyis rgyal po bya dgos so/ /de nas mi des

blon po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal po longs spyod bdag mi dgos/ /nor dang 'bru yang dgos pa med/ /sangs rgyas rnams la bdag dad pas/ /rkang gnyis dag gi mchog tu shog /zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings/ /gang na de bzhin gshegs par

'gro/ /mya ngan 'das khyim 'gro 'gyur ba/ /chos 'di khyed la bshad par bya/ /skyil mo krung ni bcas nas su/ /de nas yi dam rab bcas so/ /bdag gis sngon byas las rnams kyis/ /rgyal po'i btson rar phyin par gyur/ /smon lam 'di ni btab pas na/ /bdag gi las ni

zad par gyur/ /de nas bya bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis rdo rje'i mchus sil snyan rnams dkrol to/ /de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na khang pa brtsegs pa sum khri nyis stong byung ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga par gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa re re las kyang bya

gser gyi ze ba can/ gser gyi mchu can gser gyi gdong can bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga byung ste/ de dag gis mi'i skad du smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyis legs ma byas/ /khyod kyis shing de bcad pas na/ /bye ba brgya yi shing rnams las/ /nyi shu rtsa

bzhir gnas par gyur/ /sems can gang gis shing bskyed 'di/ /ci 'dra shes pa ma yin pa/ /sdig pa'i las kyis phyin chad kyang / /mi sdug 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag gis don 'di mi shes kyis/ /dka' thub chen po lung ston

cig /bya rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten snang byed de/ /rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba yin/ /'khor ba'i srid pa'i btson ra las/ /sems can thams cad thar byed pa'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gis shing ni ma skyes pa/ /skyes bu gnyis pa de gang yin/ /

des ni sdig pa'i las gang byas/ /gnyis skyes rnams ni smra bar byos/ /bya rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi shing ni ma skyes pa/ /de ni lha sbyin glen pa ste/ /dge ba cung zad ma byas na/ /de yi shing ni ji ltar skye/ /de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po bye ba phrag sum cu po

rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas thams cad kyang sa bcu la rab tu gnas te/ mngon par shes pa so sor thob par gyur to/ /rgyal po de yang sa bcu la gnas nas dge ba'i chos mngon par rtogs pa rjes su thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis blon po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gsum po rnams sa bcu la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa so sor thob par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde nyon

cig dang lung bstan par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang /

le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byas te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ sman gyi sde phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skye bo'i tshogs nga'i gan du 'ong ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de'i phyir skye bo'i tshogs la rnam par rtogs te ltos shig /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes rnam par bltas pa dang / shar phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas/ de'i phyogs gcig na skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ mi dag mi smra/ mi zer/ mi brjod/ mi za/

mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / lho phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra

bar 'khod pa dang / nub phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / byang phyogs nas shing

dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / 'og gi phyogs nas shing dpag tshad

bdun stong pa cig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / steng gi phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas/

de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun tu mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman

gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de

skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka'

stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten nas skye bo'i tshogs mang po lhags shing gnas pa nas 'og dang steng phyogs kyi bar nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba

stong phrag lnga bcu lhags shing gnas par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod song la 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas lhags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la khyod nyid kyis zhus shig /gsol pa/ su'i rdzu

'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mchi bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed par song shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te de nyid du mi snang bar

gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba can gyi zhing zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag brgyad cus yongs

su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba

btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar skye bo'i tshogs phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing lhags pa dag de na mchis pa'i tshe ni mthong la 'di na mchis pa'i tshe mi mthong

bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de nyid na rgyu zhing gnas so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ji lta bu lags/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin

gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'das te mchis pa na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de dag tu sems can ji snyed mthong ba de snyed ni gang na yang ma mthong ngo / /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can de dag ni sems pa med pa'i shing las byung ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sems pa ma mchis pa'i shing las ni byung ba sus mthong sus thos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde gang sems pa med pa'i

shing las mi 'byung ba khyod kyis ma mthong ma thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ma mthong ma thos so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod mthong bar 'dod na deng ngas bstan par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'tshal lo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing nas phyag rkyang ba dang phyag de las skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag brgya byung ste/ skye bo'i tshogs re res kyang lag pa brgya brgya brkyang nas spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa sna tshogs de bzhin

gshegs pa la gtor ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa gtor ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye bo'i tshogs byung ba 'di dag ni sems pa med pa'o/ /mi 'di dag ni sems pa med pa'o/ /de nas mi bye ba stong phrag brgya po de dag re re zhing yang gang lag pa brgya brgya yod pa de dag thams cad lhung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags/ bde bar gshegs pa 'di ci zhig lags/ gang mi rnams kyi lag pa brgya po yang yud tsam gyis lhung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gal te

lag pa brgya pa yang grol bar mi 'gyur na/ lag pa gnyis pa'i mi lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de bzhin du sems can rnams ni sems pa med par skye'o/ /sems pa med par 'gag go/ /sman gyi sde de'i lus kyang sems pa

med par gyur par shes par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sems can de dag la gzhon pa gang lags/ rgan pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems can gzhon pa yang yod/ rgan pa yang yod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das gzhon pa gang lags/ rgan pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag da ltar lhung ba de dag ni rgan pa'o/ /gang dag shing rnams las skyes pa de dag ni gzhon pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhon nu rnams

mthong bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing gis phyag g.yas pa'i mthil brkyang ba dang / de nas phyogs bcu nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag brgya brgya 'ong ngo / /'og dang steng gi phyogs nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba phrag lnga bcu lnga bcu 'ong ste/ skye

bo'i tshogs de dag lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mi smra/ kun tu mi smra zhing cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mi smra/ kun tu mi smra zhing cang mi mchi bar mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod mi shes sam/ sa phyogs ni sems pa med de mi smra/ kun tu mi

smra zhing chos kyi phung po yang mi shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sman gyi sde 'di la sems can gzhon nu kha cig ni mthong yang skye ba mi shes/ 'gag pa dang / rga ba dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa

dang / mdza' ba dang / bye ba dang / 'chi ba dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de dag thams cad mi shes te/ mthong yang yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur na shes par lta ga la 'gyur te/ sman gyi sde de dag yang dang yang bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang chos ma 'tshal ba'i sems can gzhon nu de dag gang nas mchis/ gang nas 'chi 'pho zhing gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ sman gyi sde nyon cig /mi'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa de dag ni dngul mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ zangs mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ shing mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ rdza mkhan gyis kyang ma byas te/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pas kyang ma byas kyi/ gzhan

du na skyes pa dang bud med 'dus pa dang sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa las byung ngo / /sems can de dag kyang yang dang yang bzo'i las rnams slob pas de dag gi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mi bzad pa 'byung ste/ der de dag sngon sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas

pa'i rnam par smin pa myong ngo / /sman gyi sde 'di nyid du gang sems can gzhon nu lhags pa mi ldang ba 'di dag ni 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ sman gyi sde de'i phyir mi smra/ kun tu mi smra'o/ /sman gyi sde de ltar na sems can gzhon nu de dag ni dge ba yang mi

shes/ skye ba yang mi shes/ 'gag pa yang mi shes te/ de dag mi'i lus kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ba 'di dag kyang sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhon nu rnams ji ltar skye/ ji ltar 'gag /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis me la shing gis reg par byas pa dang / shing de la mthar gyis me 'bar ba de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde thog ma mi'i lus su skye'o/ /skyes nas gdod tshor ba myong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das su zhig 'dir mngon par skye/ skyes nas su zhig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sangs rgyas nyid skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal pos mi la la zhig

bcings te khang pa mun pa mun nag gi nang du btson rar bcug pa dang / mi de khang pa mun nag der zhugs nas khang pa mun nag la khang pa mun nag tu mthong ngo / /de nas mi gzhan sngon sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg pa zhig gis mthong nas mi de ni ma rung bar gyur to/ /sngon sdug bsngal ma myong bas 'tsho

ba srog chad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam bsams nas des der me khyer te 'ongs nas khyim de'i nang du me cig bor ba dang / mi btson rar bcug pa des me de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dbugs phyin par gyur te spro ba skyes so/ /me de yang rgyu gang gis 'bar ba'i me 'bar ba des khyim

de kun tu 'bar bar gyur nas mi de yang de nyid du tshig pa dang / de tshig go zhes rgyal pos thos nas mi dga' ste/ de 'di snyam du phyin cad ni bdag gi yul du sems can gang yang btson rar mi gzhug go snyam du sems so/ /de nas rgyal po des rang gi yul na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/

kye sems can khyed cag ma 'jigs shig /ma skrag shig /khyed cag 'jigs par ma gyur cig /phyin chad nga'i yul du chad pas gcad pa'am/ btson rar gzhug par mi bya'o/ /sems can gang yang srog dang dbral bar mi bya/ kye sems can khyed rnams ma 'jigs shig ces de ltar

dbugs phyung ba de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba'o/ /ji ltar khyim tshig nas mi nyid kyi lus kyang tshig ste/ sems can rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs nas sems can bcings pa yang

bcings pa las yongs su thar bar byed pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dri ma spangs te/ sems can thams cad la sgron ma bzhin du 'jig rten du byung nas sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang /

dang / lha ma yin gyi lus rnams las yongs su thar bar mdzad cing sems can gzhon nu dang / rgan po rnams kyang yongs su thar bar mdzad do/ /de nas steng gi bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /rgyal ba'i zhing ni ngo mtshar zhing / /zhing mngon par 'dus

byas pa/ /de la sa bon btab pa ni/ /rnam par chud zar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba'i zhing ni dag pa'i zhing / /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsngags pa ste/ /sems can thams cad bzung ba'i phyir/ /ston pas kyang ni thabs mdzad do/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings gnas kyang / /sa yi steng na kun tu snang / /

rtag tu 'jig rten zhi byas nas/ /sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams sbyong / /sems can gzhon nu thar bar byed/ /rgan po rnams kyang thar bar byed/ /sems can thams cad khams gsum las/ /mthar gyis yongs su thar bar byas/ /sems can dmyal

ba'i sgo bcad de/ /dud 'gro thar bar byas/ /'jig rten 'di yang zhi byas nas/ /'jig rten pha rol bde bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ bka' stsal pa/ legs pa rnams ni mthong na legs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong na

legs/ /dam chos yon tan zhing yang legs/ /dge 'dun 'dus pa mthong na legs/ /zung bstan pa yang legs pa ste/ /sdig pa rnam par 'jig pa legs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal

mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can gzhon nu 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde 'di dag thams cad ni deng nyid du sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dpag tshad brgyad khri srid

kyi steng gi nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / lha bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs so/ /sems can gzhon nu de dag kyang thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bar snang la gnas

bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sgras gang bar gyur pa dang / sems can dmyal ba chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis su skyes pa'i sems can rnams sgra de nyan to/ /lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang sgra de la nyan to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen

po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i nang gi klu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'khrugs so/ /srin po bye ba stong phrag sum cu yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir lhags so/ /dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa

lnga yang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus pa chen po kun tu 'dus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gzhon nu de dag la chos bstan pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po bye ba stong phrag brgya rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags so// //bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'dus shing mchis pa mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das lha dang klu 'dus shing mchis pa yang mang ngo / /srin po bye ba phrag du ma zhig kyang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor

nas lhags te 'dus nas mchis par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mar shog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis steng nas

babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi phung po chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba ni gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su btsal nas kyang sdig pa thams cad spong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gzhon nu mi tshangs par spyod pa spangs nas gdon mi za bar gzungs

rab tu 'thob par 'gyur zhing chos thams cad dang yang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis sems can mang po zhig 'dus shing chos kyi phung po nyan/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde gang dag skye ba nyid du sdug bsngal du mi nyan/ rga ba nyid du sdug bsngal du mi nyan/ nad nyid sdug bsngal dang / mya ngan sdug bsngal dang / smre sngags 'don pa sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang sdug bsngal dang / mi

sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal du mi nyan pa'i sems can yang phal cher yod do/ /'chi ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyi phyir lus dang srog 'phrog pa yin te/ sman gyi sde 'di ni sdug bsngal thams cad ces bya'o/ /de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/

bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed dang sems can thams cad kyang 'chi'o/ /de dag gis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'chi ba'i dus kyis non par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'chi ba'i dus na rnam par shes pa tha ma la rnam par shes pa 'gag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rnam par shes pa 'khrul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung

dang / rnam par shes pa 'khrugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rigs kyi bu rlung gsum po 'di dag gis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la klong bar 'gyur/ 'khrul bar 'gyur/ 'khrug pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam

par shes pa 'gag pa na lus 'joms par bgyid pa'i rlung gsum po gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag mtshon zhes bya ba dang / skul ba zhes bya ba dang / zed pa zhes bya bas lus 'joms par byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu

lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag kun tu 'bar ba zhes kyang bya/ tshig pa zhes kyang bya/ ngar snabs zhes kyang bya/ sgregs pa zhes kyang bya/ dur khrod pa zhes kyang bya/ ngan pa'i blo zhes kyang bya/ khur lci ba zhes kyang bya/ skye bas yongs su

gzir ba zhes kyang bya/ skye bas kun tu dkrugs pa zhes kyang bya/ srog yongs su gdung ba zhes kyang bya/ 'chi ba dang sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa zhes kyang bya ste/ grogs po dag 'di rnams ni lus zhes bya'o/ /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'gum/

ji ltar 'tsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa bsod nams zhes bya ba ni 'tsho ba'o/ /grogs po dag lus zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba ste/ rgyus pa bye bas ni dkris/ spu'i khung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang

ni ldan/ yan lag khri nyis stong gis ni sbrel/ rus pa sum brgya drug cus ni brtan/ lus kyi nang na srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni gnas te/ srog chags de dag thams cad la yang 'chi ba yang yod/ 'chi ba 'gag pa yang yod do/ /nam mi de 'chi ba de na srog chags de dag

thams cad re thag chad par 'gyur te/ de na srog chags thams cad gcig la gcig za bas rlung 'khrug cing g.yo bar 'gyur te/ de na de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo / /la la ni bu'i phyir mya ngan byed/ la la ni bu mo'i phyir mya ngan byed/ la la ni gnyen gyi phyir mya ngan byed de/ de

dag thams cad mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug go/ /gcig la gcig za bar brtsams nas de dag gcig gis gcig zos te srog chags gnyis shig las pa na de gnyis kyang zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thabs te zhag bdun 'das pa dang / srog chags gcig ni bcom mo/ /gcig ni thar

to/ /tshe dang ldan pa chos zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar srog chags rnams gcig la gcig mi 'thun par byas nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sems can rnams kyang gcig la gcig mi 'thun pa byed de/ skye bas mi 'jigs/ rga bas mi 'jigs/

nad kyis mi 'jigs/ 'chi bas mi 'jigs/ ji ltar srog chags gnyis 'thab pa bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang phan tshun 'thab po/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus na skyes bu dge ba rnams kyis smras pa/ skyes bu khyod ci zhig la yid rton/ ci khyod kyis nyes

pa cung zad kyang ma mthong ngam/ skye ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/ rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/ 'chi ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis skye ba'i nyes pa yang mthong ngo / /rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa yang mthong ngo / /thams cad kyi tha mar 'chi ba'i

nyes pa yang mthong ngo / /smras pa/ ci'i phyir gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bya ba ma byas/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gnyi gar bde ba 'phel ba'i chos kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma byas/ grogs po dag gnyis su yang dri'o/ /khyod ci'i phyir skye ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su thar

ba'i dge ba'i tshogs ma byas/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pa so sor brtag pa ma byas/ ji ltar khyed kyis sa la gaN+DI rdung ba'i sgra ma thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing la dge ba'i sa bon bskrun cing spos sam/ phreng ba'am/ mar me sbyin pa byin pa ma mthong / de

bzhin gshegs pa la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'bul ba dang / 'khor bzhi tshim par byas pa yang ma mthong / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de dag ni 'khor bzhi'o/ /de ltar de la phan pa'i phyir smras te/

bsnyad pa dang / lha cung zad kyang ma bgyis so/ /mi khyod kyis ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas mi dge ba byas so/ /de'i tshe mi shi ba de la chos kyi rgyal pos rjes su bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung mthong zhing / /gaN+DI rdung ba thos gyur la/ /

mya ngan 'das pa zhir 'gro ba'i/ /chos bstan thos kyang ma byas so/ /de nas mi des slar smras pa/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur te/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song nas/ /'dod pas 'khrul pa'i sems kyis su/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so/ /'dod pa dag kyang

bsten pa dang / /bdag gis srog chags rnams kyang bsad/ /dge 'dun rnams kyang chud gsan pas/ /mi bzad de yi 'bras bu 'ong / /gnod par sems pa'i yid kyis su/ /bdag gis mchod rten bshig pa byas/ /tshig ngan rnams kyang rab tu smras/ bdag gis

ma yang gdung bar byas/ /bdag gis lus kyis gang byas pa/ /nyes pa dag kyang rab tu shes/ /sems dmyal chen po ngu 'bod du/ /shin tu mi bzad skye ba mthong / /bsdus gzhom du yang tshor ba myong / /de bzhin rab tu tsha ba dang / /mnar med chen po mi bzad par/ /

tshor ba rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /pad ma lta bur cher gas pa'i/ /sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal du/ /thig nag btab pa 'jigs chen du/ /lan brgya bar du skye bar 'gyur/ /sems dmyal sems can bsad nas su/ /phyis kyang 'jigs pa de mthong ste/ /

dpag tshad brgyar ni yang dang yang / /'jigs pa chen por ltung bar 'gyur/ /de dag sgo rnyed mi 'gyur te/ /phyis kyang mun par rab tu ltung / /spu gri zhes bya sems dmyal du/ /spu gri stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis/ /spu gri mdun du 'byung 'gyur te/ /

bdag gis nyes pa'i las byas pas/ /de dag gis ni de lus gtubs/ /rlung 'khrugs chen po mi bzad pas/ /lus de thams cad 'jig par byed/ /rtag tu 'di 'dra'i sems dmyal du/ /bdag gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /lus ni rab tu sdug bsngal bar/ /sems

can kun gyis bdag mthong ngo / /khyim so bya phyir gzhan dag gi/ /nor yang rab tu bdag gis blangs/ /bdag gi bu pho bu mo dang / /de bzhin phu nu sring mo dang / /bdag gi pha ma'ang de bzhin te/ /mdza' bo gnyen bshes mang po dang / /bran dang las byed rnams dang ni/ /

de bzhin ba dang phyugs dang g.yog /dgos pa ngan la bdag 'khrul te/ /gser dang dngul gyi snod rnams dang / /de bzhin phra rab gos rnams dang / /khyim byed bcug pas 'khrul pa ste/ /khyim yang shin tu bkra byas nas/ /skyes pa bud med lang long dang / /pi bang sil

snyan 'khrol ba la/ /bdag yid ma dul dga' bar 'gyur/ /spos chu dag gis lus bkrus kyang / /da dung byas pa gzo ba med/ /lus khyod sems pa med pa ste/ /nga ni khyod kyi ched la 'khrul/ /phyin chad sems can 'ga' tsam yang / /bdag la skyob

par 'gyur ba med/ /rlung 'khrug chen po mi bzad par/ /lus ni yongs su gdung ba na/ /ro dang ldan pa zhim zos te/ /lces kyang sna tshogs de bzhin no/ /phreng ba sna tshogs bzang mdzes pa/ /rab tu mang po mgo la bcings/ /mig ni gzugs kyis 'khrul byas te/ /

mig gi skyabs ni yod ma yin/ /bdag gis mthong nas gang byas pa/ /sdig pa rnams ni mig gi rgyu/ /lag pa rdo rjes bcad pa ni/ /bdag gi rna ba'i rgyu yin no/ /lag pa gnyis la gdu bu btags/ /sor mo rnams la sor gdub bcug /mgul du mu tig se mo do/ /

rkang pa gnyis kyang rab tu brgyan/ /de la dra ba byas pa dang / /de la gser yang gnas par byas/ /lus la rin chen sna tshogs dang / /gser gyi gdu bu'ang de bzhin no/ /longs spyod chen pos rab rtses nas/ /yid kyang shin tu rtag par gyur/ /rab tu 'jam la bdag reg nas/ /

shin tu sred pas de bsten to/ /gding ba sna tshogs mal cha yis/ /bdag gis lus ni rtser bcug go/ /spos chu bzang pos khrus byas te/ /spos rnams kyis kyang rab tu bskus/ /lha rdzas ga pur tsan dan gyi/ /bdug pa rnams kyis rab tu bdugs/ /kha dog bzang po byas nas

kyang / /gla rtsi ldan pas rab tu bsgos/ /lo lon 'bru mar dri dag dang / /sna ma tsam pa ka la sogs/ /bskus nas phra mo ka shi ka/ /dkar po'i gos kyang rab tu bgos/ /glang po'i rgyab nas babs nas su/ /rta yi rgyab tu mngon par zhon/ /bdag ni rgyal po yin snyam sems/ /

skye bo bdag gi mdun na rgyug /glu gar shin tu bslabs pa yi/ /slas rnams kyang ni rab tu shes/ /rnams ni ma nyes par/ /bdag gis mdas kyang bsad/ /'jig rten phyi ma ma shes pas/ /bdag gis 'di 'dra'i sdig byas shing / /bdag gis gzhan gyi sha

zos pas/ /de phyir bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di/ /mi bzad 'ong bar 'gyur ba yi/ /'chi ba bdag gis ma shes te/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur pas/ /bdag gi lus kyang gso ba byas/ /deng ni bdag la 'chi 'ong na/ /skyabs byed pa ni su yang med/ /gnyen

rnams khyed cag thams cad kyang / /nga yi gdong du bltar ci yod/ /ci zhig phyir ni gos 'dral zhing / /ci phyir ngu zhing smre sngags 'don/ /ci phyir skra rnams rab 'jig cing / /ci phyir khrag kyang 'byin par byed/ /ci phyir mgo la rdul 'thor zhing / /brang yang rab tu rdung bar

byed/ /bdag gson tshe na sdig pa rnams/ /spang bar bya rigs khyed ci mdud/ /bdag gi lus ni spyang ki dang / /khyi dang bya rog rnams dang ni/ /bya rnams kyis kyang bza' bar 'gyur/ /lus 'di dgos pa med par gsos/ /'chi ba'i sbrul dang ldan gyur nas/ /mi ni rtag

tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa 'di las grol 'gyur ba/ /de lta bu yi sman rnams bsten/ /bdag la sman pas gang byin pa'i/ /sman de dgos pa ma yin na/ /nyon mongs sbrul las thar byed pa/ /da ltar chos kyi sman rnams ni/ /'chi kar bdag la sbyin par byos/ /

sha ni nga la ma sbyin cig /lus 'di gso ba byas kyang ni/ /gdon mi za bar 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang phyir sdug bsngal sbyin gyur pa/ /sdig gi phung po ci phyir blangs/ /lus 'di shin tu gsos byas kyang / /bya ba ma rungs byed par 'gyur/ /bu dang bu mo ci zhig phyir/ /nga la

mig gis lta bar byed/ /na ba 'di las nga skyobs shig /don med par ni ci phyir ngu / /bu dang bu mo khyed cag dag /nga ni ma rung ma byed cig /khyed cag gso bar bya ba'i phyir/ /ngas ni gzhan gyi nor yang phrogs/ /da ni 'chi dus bab pa na/ /re thag chad kyis ci zhig byed/ /

skye dang ngan 'gros rab tu 'jigs/ /'chi bas kyang ni yongs su gzir/ /tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang / /reg pa shin tu tshor ba'o/ /sred pas byis pa rnams kyang 'khyam/ /mi bzad 'bras bu rnams kyang thob/ /ngan pa'i rigs su skye ba ni/ /der yang mya ngan bcings par 'gyur/ /

bdag la bsod nams chung shes nas/ /skye bo gzhan dag mya ngan byed/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims yongs su nyams/ /chos la yang ni rgyab kyis phyogs/ /yang skye ba ni mi shes pas/ /nyon mongs sbrul gyis nyon mongs pa/ /ma rig pas ni byis

pa rnams/ /gang na thar pa med par 'khyam/ /thar pa'i don ni mi shes nas/ /'khrul pas sdig pa rnams kyang byed/ /nyon mongs rnams kyis byis pa 'khyam/ /yid ni rtag tu rnam par 'khrugs/ /bcing ba sna tshogs ldan lus la/ /mes ni kun tu 'bar zhing tshig /

gang na bde ba med pa der/ /lus ni rnam par 'khrul pas 'khyam/ /gang las shin tu bde 'byung ba/ /bde ba de ni mi shes te/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bde ba sbyin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo sman gyi mchog /tshul khrims bden pa'i tshul khrims so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

tshangs dbyangs yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems can dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de ltar smre sngags 'don kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par de

dag gi skyob par 'gyur ba su yang med do zhes bka' de skad stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsungs so/ /sdig pa'i las ni byas pas na/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su ltung / /sreg pa'i gos ni gyon par 'gyur/ /skom du lcags khu 'thung bar 'gyur/ /lus rnams la ni

me mdag 'bab/ /tshig nas rab tu mi bzad du/ /sems can dmyal ba 'jigs chen du/ /de yi lus ni rab tu 'tshig /bde ba dag ni mi shes shing / /chos kyang rnam par mi shes te/ /chos ma yin pas byis pa 'khyam/ /bde ba cung zad rnyed mi 'gyur/ /dad dang tshul khrims

phun sum tshogs/ /shes rab ldan zhing dka' thub che/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs par myur du 'gyur/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir/ /brtson 'grus kyi ni mchog rtsoms la/ /sems can thams cad yongs bzung ba/ /dge ba'i las kyi

chos ston cig /byams pa'i sems dang de bzhin du/ /tshangs spyod mchog la snyoms par zhugs/ /sman sde de skad thos nas kyang / /mchog tu bsgrub par 'gyur bar bya/ /rnam grol mthong dang sangs rgyas dang / /sgra bsgrags rnam par 'dren pa dang / /'jig rten gyi ni pha dang ma/ /de ni byang

chub sems zhes bya/ /'jig rten du ni chos 'di gang ston pa/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog tu rab rnyed dka'/ /sangs rgyas bstan la gang dag sus nyan pa/ /de dag bla med sangs rgyas bde gshegs 'gyur/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas sras rnams la/ /gang dag gus dang bcas 'gyur ba/ /de dag kyang

ni sems can kun/ /thar byed 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du dog sa 'di dag g.yo rab tu g.yo/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan

'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde ci mthong ltos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bltas pa dang / phyogs bzhi nas gas pa mthong ngo / /sa gas pas sa gas pa'i phrag nas mi

bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang / 'og gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang / steng gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga byung ba mthong ngo / /de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis rnam par bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dir su dag skyes/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag ni khyed la bde ba'i phyir skyes so/ /gsol pa/ sems can 'di dag

kyang 'gum par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag de bzhin te/ sems can thams cad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can gzhon nu snga ma gang dag thog ma nyid du skyes pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni yang skye ba dang 'gum pa la blta bar mi spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na brtson 'grus kyi stobs rnyed par spro'am/ de dag gis gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du blta bar bgyi'o/ /

de nas chos gang mnyan pa zhus te yid du 'ong ba mnyan par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams la blta bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu la spro'i skye ba dang 'gum pa la ni blta

bar mi spro'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig tu stan las langs nas de dag thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la 'gro zhing skyil mo krung bcas nas bsam gtan byed de/

de dag thams cad kyi lus las seng ge rnams byung ngo / /stag rnams byung ngo / /sbrul rnams byung ngo / /glang po rnams byung ngo / /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul pa ston to/ /ril yang skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /steng du dpag tshad nyi khri srid du yang 'gro'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba stong

phrag bcu yang 'bab par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems can gzhon nu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od zer chen po gda' ba dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul ba 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed zla ba dang / nyi ma byung ba 'di la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di

ni byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus las 'od zer snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul bstan pa ste bstan nas kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang / lha rnams dang /

mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag 'dir mi'i lus dang / stobs dang brtson 'grus bstan nas 'di 'dra ba'i stobs nye bar ston to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od zer snang ba 'byung bar bgyi ba'i slad du

chos bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos

pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /des 'di snyam bsams te/ gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu'o/ /snyam bsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /bstan par bya'o/ /rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /sman gyi sde gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus

rnams kyi de thams cad bstan par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das the tsom bsal ba'i slad du bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bu stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong

phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang / klu'i rgyal po bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba dang / 'byung po bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad kyis bskor ba dang / dang / sha za bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas bskor ba mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems can 'di dag ni chos nyan pa'i phyir 'khor 'dir nga'i gan du 'dus shing 'khod gor ma chag ste/ sman gyi sde 'di dag ni deng kho nar 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pas deng nyid sa bcu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur

ro/ /sa bcu la rab tu gnas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rga dang 'chi las thar bya'i phyir/ /las byas bde ba thob byed cing / /nyon mongs zhags pa pham byas nas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi gnas mang po las sna tshogs kyis byung ba 'di ci'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor cing gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde nyon cig /sems can rmongs pa mi shes pa/ /thar bar

'gyur ba ga la yod/ /sems can gzhon nu mang po dag /de ring gzugs rnams thob par 'gyur/ /sa bcu dag ni 'thob pa'i phyir/ /chos kun rab tu shes par 'gyur/ /sa bcu dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bya ba byed par 'gyur/ /chos

kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /chos char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur/ /de ltar sems can 'dus pas na/ /nga yi bstan pa dga' ba'o/ /lha dang klu dang dang / /lha min shin tu mi bzad pas/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas te/ /chos

kyi sgra yang sgrogs par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rnga yang rdung bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi dung yang rab tu 'bud/ /sems can gzhon nu 'di dag kyang / /brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pas thob pa bzhin/ /de dag deng ni

chos thob 'gyur/ /de nas sems can gzhon nu lnga stong tsam stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang phyir mtha' ni ma 'tshal ba/ /'khor

ba na ni 'chi ba ste/ /lus ni khur lci bcom ldan 'das/ /'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa/ /lam ni rnam par ma 'tshal te/ /lam nyid kyang ni mi gda' bas/ /mgon po bdag cag ldongs gyur na/ /bdag cag rnams ni bsdu bar gsol/ /

dpa' la bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal/ /'dren pas chos ni bshad du gsol/ /bdag cag shes rab chung ngur skyes/ /bde ba mngon par ma 'tshal to/ /bdag cag la ni chos bshad gsol/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad grol bar mdzod/ /gang

dang gang du skyes par yang / /bdag cag sangs rgyas mthong gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed cag rnams ni zas zo shig /

rmad du byung ba'i ro yang 'thung / /'jigs pa med par gyur nas su/ /phyis gdod 'jigs med chos nyon cig /smras pa/ btsun pa gnas brtan khyod su zhig /bdag cag rnams kyis khyod mi shes/ /khyod ni rab tu mdzes par mthong / /gzugs

ni zhi zhing grags pa che/ /'jig rten 'jigs chen dang / /sems dmyal dud 'gro rnams las thar/ /ji ltar 'gro ba mdzes pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi sdig pa thams cad zhi/ /khyod kyi lag na snod yod pa/ /rin chen sna bdun ldan pa dang / /

lus la rin chen srad bu dang / /gzi brjid phung pos brgyan pa mthong / /zhi ba khyod kyis tshig smras pa/ /bdag cag lan 'debs mi nus so/ /bdag cag la ni zas rnams dang / /zhim po'i skom yang mi dgos te/ /zas las bshang ba 'byung

bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin skom yang gcin du 'gyur/ /khu ba rnams las khrag tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin khrag las shar 'gyur bas/ /zas dang skom rab sbyar ba yang / /bdag cag rnams la dgos ma yin/ /dar dang snam bu sbyar ba dang / /phra

mo'i gos kyang dgos pa med/ /gser gyi gdu bu mi dgos te/ /mu tig phreng ba dgos ma yin/ /sor gdub dag kyang mi dgos te/ /de kun mi rtag chos can no/ /bdag cag ngan par 'gro rnams su/ /'gro bar mi 'gyur srog tshol lo/ /lha rnams kyi

ni bde ba dang / /chos kyi sbyin pa don du gnyer/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dgos te/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal ma yin no/ /rab tu bzang ba'i gling bor nas/ /'khor los sgyur ba 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bu yang phyi bzhin mi 'brang ste/ /

chung ma bu mo rnams kyang min/ /rin chen sna bdun phyi na las/ /phyi bzhin 'brang ba ma yin no/ /skye bo mang po bsdus pa yang / /phyi bzhin 'gro ba ma yin te/ /mdun du rgyug pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ltar phyin cad mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe gcig gis ni rgyal po las/ /

mi rtag pas ni 'khyam 'gyur te/ /sdig pa'i las rnams mang byas pas/ /de dag sems dmyal ngu 'bod ltung / /rin chen sna bdun rdzu 'phrul ches/ /phyogs bzhi kun tu bskor ba las/ /gang tshe ngu 'bod smin pa'i tshe/ /rdzu 'phrul

de ni gang du song / /sa gang dag na yod min pa/ /shi nas rdzu 'phrul byed mi nus/ /gnas brtan bdag cag rnams la gson/ /gang na de bzhin gshegs par bzhud/ /pha dang ma ni ji lta bar/ /de ni mthong bar rab tu 'dod/ /bdag

cag la ni ma yang med/ /pha med phu nu rnams kyang med/ /'jig rten gtso bo de bzhin gshegs/ /de nyid pha dang ma yin no/ /de nyid nyi ma zla ba ste/ /bde ba'i lam ni rab ston pa'o/ /gang phyir phyin chad mi skye bar/ /de ni 'khor ba

thar mdzad pa'o/ /nyon mongs chu bo 'jigs chen dang / /chu bo sgrol ba'i gru de'o/ /de yis sems can rab bsgral te/ /phyin chad slar ni mi ldog go/ /byang chub mchog ni rab ston pa/ /dam pa'i chos kyang des bshad do/ /bdag

cag rnams la zas mi dgos/ /rgyal srid 'bras bu mi 'dod de/ /sems can dmyal bas 'jigs pa ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten 'gro mi bya/ /mi yi tshe ni bde ba ste/ /de na thams cad mkhyen par snang / /rang gi las ni nyes byas pas/ /tshe thung rnams ni

'khyam pa yin/ /de dag 'chi ba mi shes kyi/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyal srid shes/ /skye dang 'gag pas bslus pa rnams/ /shes pa med cing 'jigs pa med/ /mi rtag pas ni sems 'khrul rnams/ /phra ba'i chos rnams mi shes te/ /phra ba'i dgos pa mi byed la/ /

zhi ba'i dbyings kyang mi shes so/ /'chi 'pho la ni skyo med pa/ /yang dang yang du skye bar 'gyur/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rab gzir cing / /rtag tu dbyug pas brdegs byas nas/ /gzhan dag gi yang 'phrog byed de/ /de bzhin bcing zhing bsad pa byas/ /sngon gyi sdig pas bskul bas

na/ /de dag bcing ba lngas bcings so/ /re thag kyang ni chad par 'gyur/ /mya ngan zug rngus zug par 'gyur/ /rnam par shes pa 'gag pa na/ /snying rje bar ni smre sngags 'don/ /bdag gi skyob par su 'gyur la/ /gser dang dngul dang shel dag dang / /longs spyod thams cad bdag

gis dbul/ /bdag ni bran du'ang 'gyur bar bya/ /bran gyi tshul du gang gyur pa/ /las rnams thams cad rab tu bya/ /rgyal srid longs spyod bdag mi dgos/ /nor dang 'bru yang ma yin no/ /rang gi lus ni bdag mi dgos/ /sdig pa byed pa mi 'grol te/ /de ltar gnas

brtan bdag cag la/ /bza' ba dgos pa ma yin no/ /gang dag kha zas zhim zos pa/ /rgyal po rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /btung ba mchog ni 'thungs pa yi/ /lha yi bu rnams 'chi bar 'gyur/ /cho ma cho dgu ro ldan pa/ /zas dang skom ni rab bshams te/ /rgyal po'i mdun

du blangs nas su/ /kha zas la ni lces reg nas/ /rgyal po rnams ni ro la chags/ /sdig pa mi chung rnams kyang byed/ /gang la snying po med pa yi/ /mi rtag ro la chags par byed/ /bdag cag rnams la skom mi dgos/ /bza' ba dag kyang dgos ma yin/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal gang grol ba/ /chos

nyid de 'dra dgos ma yin/ /sred pa'i bcings las rab grol zhing / /sred pa'i nyon mongs rnams thar te/ /bcings pa kun las rab grol ba'i/ /sangs rgyas de la skyabs su dong / /drang srong chen po 'jig mgon la/ /bdag cag rnams ni skyabs su 'dong / /sems can rnams kyis mthong dka'

la/ /phyag 'tshal phyir ni bdag cag 'dong / /khyod kyi mtshan ni ma 'tshal gyis/ /snyan pa'i mtshan ni bstan du gsol/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ khyed dang skye bo thams cad dang / /de bzhin ming ni thos par 'dod/ /sems can gzhon nu bye ba phrag /stong

gis de bzhin gshegs pa bskor/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyod ni sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi/ /ming ni zab par grags pa yin/ /skye bo kun kyang de bzhin du/ /khyod kyi ming ni thos par 'dod/ /smras pa/ nga yi ming ni sman gyi sde/ /nga ni sems can rnams kyi sman/ /sman rnams kun gyi dam

pa ni/ /khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya/ /nad kun gyis btab skye bo yi/ /nad rnams thams cad zhi bar byed/ /'dod chags nad ni nad po che/ /'jig rten 'jigs byed mi bzad pa/ /gang gis blo med 'khyam pa yi/ /gti mug nad ni che zhing drag /sems dmyal de bzhin

dud 'gro dang / /rnams su sems can 'gro/ /byis pa 'di dag zhe sdang zin/ /de dag ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur/ /de dag gis smras pa/ dge ba'i chos ni 'di thos pas/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol/ /byis pa blo ni mi shes pa/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol nas

kyang / /sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te/ /bdag cag chos kyi sbyin pa nyan/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /'jigs pa mi bzad rnams kyang spangs/ /nad rnams thams cad zhi byed pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal po sman pa ste/ /sdug bsngal ba rnams

gso byed pa/ /yang dag sangs rgyas myur du blta/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag bya phyir/ /gnas brtan khyod ni myur du bzhud/ /phyag byas bdag cag rnams kyi tshig /'jig rten rnam par 'dren la gsungs/ /nad 'di rab tu zhi bar mdzod/ /

lus ni thams cad rab 'bar te/ /tshig cing zhi ba med pa yi/ /mi bzad me ni zhi bar mdzod/ /lus kyi khur ni khur po che/ /shin tu mi bzad rno ba'i khur/ /sdug bsngal gzir ba bdag cag la/ /brtul zhugs dam pa thugs rje mdzod/ /skye bo rtag tu zhe sdang dang / /gti

mug non pa'i khur khyer te/ /khur las thar ba mi shes pa/ /de dag yang dang yang khur khyer/ /thar pa'i lam ni mi shes shing / /thar pa'i lam ni ma mthong rnams/ /'chi ba rnam par shes mod kyi/ /'on kyang 'jigs pa mi skyed do/ /

bdag cag la ni nam du yang / /'chi ba med snyam bde bar gnas/ /kun tu 'khrul pas ma shi ba/ /mthong yang rnam par mi shes so/ /de dag pha yang mi dran te/ /nad kyis kyang ni rtag gzir cing / /nyon mongs las kyis rab dkrugs na/ /

ji ltar kha zas za bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal nyam thag mi shes te/ /bdag cag ngal ba don med do/ /khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /ma rig gzhi las skyes pa'o/ /'du shes 'du byed tshor ba rnams/ /'jigs chen lci ba'i khur yin no/ /

gang chos rnam par mi shes pa/ /byis pa sred pas rab tu 'khyam/ /lus kyi khur gyis bskor ba ni/ /'jig rten du ni don med skyes/ /gos gtsang shin tu bzang ba dang / /khrus dang byug pa dgos pa'o/ /lus la gang yid 'ong ba yi/ /kha zas

zhim po dgos pa ste/ /yid 'ong ba yi sil snyan lnga/ /de bzhin rna bas tshor bar byed/ /rin chen bdun las byung ba yi/ /gzugs la mig gis chags par byed/ /zhim pa'i ro rnams thams cad ni/ /lces kyang tshor bar byed pa ste/ /

'jam zhing phra ba'i reg pa yang / /lus kyis rtag tu tshor bar byed/ /lus kyis su ni sha gnyis po/ /dga' bar yang ni bsgrubs pa las/ /sems pa med pa'i lus 'di skyes/ /de la dga' ba su zhig rnyed/ /de na bdag rkang dga' byed pa/ /

lham ni rab tu bzang gyon yang / /'chi bar 'gyur tshe gos rnams dang / /byug pa skyabs su mi 'gyur te/ /lus kyang skyabs su 'gyur min na/ /gos dang byug pa smos ci dgos/ /mi zhes bya ba lus yin te/ /dbugs dang stobs chen rnyed par 'gyur/ /

so sor rtog pa'i rna ba'i stobs/ /de ni lus la yon tan che/ /sngon chad rta dang glang po yis/ /kun tu bskor nas rtse zhing 'khyam/ /thar pa'i chos ni ma shes nas/ /bdag ci sdig pa'i las la chags/ /'jig rten pha rol ma shes nas/ /

rtse bas sdig pa byed du bcug /bdag ni yang dang yang skyes te/ /shi ba bdag la yang 'ongs so/ /yang dang yang du mya ngan mthong / /smre sngags 'don pas rab tu bcings/ /ma rnams kyang ni shi ba mthong / /pha rnams shi dang gnyen dag dang / /sring mo dang ni bu dag

dang / /chung ma rnams kyang shi ba mthong / /mngon par 'du byed kun stong na/ /sems dang bcas pa su zhig chags/ /'dod pas zin pa'i sems kyis su/ /bdag gis yid brtan rung bar shes/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mi dmigs te/ /'chi ba la ni mngon dga' med/ /de phyir

'dod pas bsgribs sems kyis/ /bdag gis sbyin pa ma byin no/ /de bas 'dod dang mnyam sdig med/ /de ni da dung mi ldog go/ /kun tu nor bas bdag cag skyes/ /'gro ba mtha' dag kun tu nor/ /kun tu nor ba'i sgra yang nyan/ /dam chos ma yin yongs su

'dzin/ /thar pa dang ni bsam gtan btsal/ /lus ni khur du bkur mi bya/ /'jig rten don du 'gro ba'i gtso/ /sangs rgyas ston pa rnams su shog /sangs rgyas 'jig rten pha dang ma/ /sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/ /'dzam bu'i gling ni kun tu yang / /rin chen

char pa rab tu 'bebs/ /chos kyi bsdu ba ci 'dra ba/ /sems can blun pos mi shes te/ /byang chub tu ni sems bsngos na/ /chos kyi bsdu ba thob par 'gyur/ /'du byed thams cad stong pa ste/ /de bzhin longs spyod nor yang stong / /bdag kyang stong par mthong bas na/ /mthong

nas re ba med par gyur/ /gnas brtan sman gyi sde khyod kyis/ /bdag cag rnams kyi tshig gson cig /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir/ /khyod ni pho nyar bzhud 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams dran nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba med/ /brtson 'grus ldan zhing dka'

thub che/ /yon tan kun tu sdud par byed/ /ston de ga la bzhugs par bzhud/ /ston pa bde bar rab sad nas/ /rgyal ba cung zad mi skyo bar/ /bdag cag slad du zhu ba mdzod/ /khyod kyis bdud ni gzhom pa dang / stobs dang bcas pa pham par byas/ /sems

can thams cad yongs 'dzin pa'i/ /chos kyang myur du 'bar bar byas/ /gang gis sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yi/ /chos ni bdag cag ma thos kyis/ /bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /gnas brtan myur du bzhud du gsol/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan

mnga' ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba/ /de srid bdag cag mi rgal zhes/ /thams cad gus dang bcas par gnas/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ khyed cag de ltar ci zhig mthong / /re zhig gyen du blta bar byos/ /de dag gyen du bltas pa dang / /

khang pa brtsegs pa sum stong dang / /lnga brgya tham par tshang ba zhig /kun tu yang ni gnas par gyur/ /rin chen bdun gyis shin tu spras/ /rin chen dra bas legs par brgyan/ /dbus na me tog rab tu rgyas/ /lha rdzas spos kyang rab tu 'bab/ /de na

gnas brtan dris pa ni/ /khang brtsegs rin chen dra ba dang / /pad ma ze bar kun gnas par/ /'di na snang ba 'di ci zhig /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ gnas 'di dag ni khyed kyi ste/ /sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir deng shig /'jig rten 'das gtso gang yin pa/ /'jig

rten snang byed de la thud/ /de dag gis smras pa/ de yi lam yang ma 'tshal te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang ma mthong na/ /gang na lam yang ma 'tshal bas/ /phyag 'tshal du ni gang du mchi/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ nam mkha' mtha' yas ji bzhin du/ /reg

par rung ba ma yin pas/ /bdud rtsi rab sbyin ston pa la/ /phyag 'tshal phyir ni 'gro mi nus/ /ji ltar ri rab gnas pa ltar/ /ston pa de yang gnas na bzhugs/ /ri rab gzhal du rung ba yin/ /rgya mtsho chen po gting tshod zin/ /stong gsum rdul phran dpag tu rung / /sangs rgyas 'byung

ba shes ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad la 'dud/ /smras pa/ 'jig rten mgon po bdag cag gzigs/ /bdag cag bsam pa rdzogs par mdzod/ /bdag cag sems kyis ston pa la/ /phyag bgyis de nas 'bras bu thob/ /

sman gyi sdes smras pa/ ston pa dri la mi chags te/ /phreng ba ma yin byug pa min/ /gang gis 'dus byas grol 'gyur ba/ /sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'dzin to/ /gang gis yid ni btul byas shing / /sangs rgyas la yang skyabs song ba/ /de la bdud ni mi bzad mchog /thab

mo rgol bar mi byed do/ /'chi ba'i dbang du mi 'gro yi/ /gzungs ni myur du rnyed par 'gyur/ /de sems rab tu dang byas nas/ /de nas ston pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ka la ping ka'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer brgyad khri bzhi stong byung ste/ 'od zer

de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur/ sems can dmyal ba chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang khyab par gyur/ lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang snang bar gyur/ 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs sha stag la

'di lta ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang le brgan dang shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad bgyis nas slar log ste/

bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur pa'i 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

gal te bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag

sum cu byung ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos phra ba bstan pa rtogs nas/ sems can rgan po rnams la sems can rgan po khyed rnams ni chos mi shes pa'o/ /rtag tu chos ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba la chags pa'o/ /zhes phra mo rnams

mi snyan pa mchi zhing yongs su rjod la gnod pa bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du tshig snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di dag smras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de dag ci'i phyir tshig 'di skad smra ba mi shes sam/ de dag ni

de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam zhing shin tu snyan pa smra ste/ chos kyang thos pas sman gyi sde de'i phyir de dag chos thams cad kyi don khong du chud par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ de dag thams cad gzungs rtogs par 'gyur/ deng phyin chad sa

bcu la gnas par 'gyur/ deng chos kyi rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur/ deng chos chen po'i rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong

lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde deng nyid sems can gzhon nu 'di dag khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi nang du zhugs nas chos mngon par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /deng nyid dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /

deng chos kyi rnga chen po rdung bar 'gyur te/ lha'i ris du ma zhig deng chos mngon par rtogs pa thob par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can log par ltung ba la gnas pa mang po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan pa thos

nas 'khor ba bsnyil te rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe sems can rgan po bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob ste/ de dag thams cad kyang chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su

spangs par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni chos chen po'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde phyogs bzhir ltos shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

sman gyi sdes phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas pa dang / shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / lho phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i

klung bye ba phrag bdun cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / byang phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / 'og gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / steng gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba

phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'ong ste/ de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nam

mkha' bar snang la gzugs nag po dang / gzugs dmar po gda' ba ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde gang bar snang la gzugs nag po dang / gzugs dmar po mthong ba 'di ci yin mi shes sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni mkhyen te/ sman gyi sde

'di ni bdud yin no/ /sman gyi sde mthong bar 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam

pa 'di lta bu lhags so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams kyi rkyen gyis te/ de sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi chos dang

ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde khyod kyis sems can gzugs sna tshogs 'dir lhags pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byin gyi rlabs sna tshogs 'di lhags pa dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed dang /

byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed cig rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gnas te/ gzugs sna tshogs kha dog sna tshogs dbyibs sna tshogs pa dag gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'phags pa'i chos kyi gnas la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'

de dag 'khor dang bcas nas chos kyi gnas la gnas pa mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' gsar rnying de dag

kun dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA tsin t+ya pra b+hAs nir da sho nA ma d+harma par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por gnas nas bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / nang mi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / byog pa dang / myang ba bzang po mang po brnyes so/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/

skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ gdung phun sum tshogs pa/ cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs

pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa'i sgra dang / snyan pa 'jig rten du rgya cher mngon du byung bar gyur to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig

rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/

yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /spyan lnga dang yang ldan te/ sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang / shes rab kyi spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa

dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu rnams ni tshar bcad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di lha dang mi rnams kyis yang dag par bzung zhing 'bar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs mnabs te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas dge

slong gi tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ mdun du gzigs pa dang / g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa mdzes pa dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba mdzes pa dang / chos gos snam sbyar

dang / bsil zan dang / na bza'i tshags dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa mdzes pa dang / sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang / 'od 'dom gang bas mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na me'i phung po lta bu dang / tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang / nyi ma shar ba lta bur phyogs su snang

zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ni ldan te/ grong khyer chen por mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ cho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad

du byung ba chos rnam pa 'di dag byung ste/ skyes bu dam pa 'dren pa de gshegs pa'i tshe/ der cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po gang dag byung ba de dag brjod par bya/ shin tu dad pa'i sems kyis nyon cig /long ba rnams kyis ni mthong ngo / /'on pa rnams kyis ni thos so/ /gcer bu rnams kyis ni gos rnyed

do/ /smyon pa rnams kyis ni dran pa thob po/ /grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad ni thal mo sbyar te/ bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang khar rnga dang / sgra snyan dag ni ma brdungs par sgra 'byung ngo / /ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / khu byug dag

kyang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin to/ /gang dag gter stor ba de dag gis ni gter rnams rnyed par gyur to/ /gser dang dngul las byas pa'i snod rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo / /sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing 'gul te/ sems can rnams skyabs med

par yang ma gyur cig /yid dang ba rab tu thob bo/ /smra ba'i mchog dam pa sangs rgyas kyis gang dang gang du zhabs kyis gom pa bor ba de dang der pad ma dri ma med cing / legs par gnas pa rnams byung ngo / /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag

thams cad kyang bde ba rnyed nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang dag sbrum pa de dag kyang mi bde ba med pa nyid du gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa dag btsas so/ /sems can rnams la yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis gnod par gyur pa

med do/ /rab tu sdang ba'i sems med par phan tshun du smra ste/ dper na pha'am ma zhig bu gcig pa la smra ba bzhin no/ /srang gi g.yas g.yon rnams kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang me tog sil ma dag mngon par gtor

to/ /sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa gang yang med do/ /sems can gang dag na bar gyur pa de dag kyang nad med par gyur te/ bde ba thob bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa gshegs pa na sems can so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa ci bdag kho na la gzigs so snyam du sems so/ /so so

nas bdag nyid bsod snyoms 'bul zhing / mi'i 'dren pa la brten nas bdag kho na bsod snyoms kyi 'bras bu la sbyor ro snyam du sems te/ de gshegs pa tsam yang gzhal bar sla ba ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du mthar chags su bsod snyoms bzhes shing

gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das grong bar gyi dbus zhig tu gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe khang stong zhig tu khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig bor bar gyur te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug nas/ 'jib cing 'dug pa la khyi'am/ ce spyang gang dag khang stong der lhags pa

de dag kyang khye'u de la lce'i dbang pos bldags shing 'dong ste/ ji ltar sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas khye'u de la 'tshe ba mi byed do/ /khang stong der skye bo phal po che dag kyang 'jug cing 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che 'jug cing 'byung ba gzigs nas mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang du skye bo phal po che 'di dag 'jug cing 'byung ba'i khang stong de na ci yod ltos/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ khang stong ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang

khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug ste/ 'jib cing 'dug la mig gnyis mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la lta ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste

phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skabs de gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das khang stong de na khye'u bor ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che'i gzugs ltar mchis pa/ mig mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la lta ba zhig mchis so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma khye'u 'di ni sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/ nga'i legs par bshad pa'i don shes par nus shing / skal ba can no snyam nas/ khye'u de la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dge ba la gzud pa'i phyir/ khang stong ga la ba der gshegs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das der gshegs nas phyogs gcig tu bzhugs te/ phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas/ khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sbrul dang gnod sbyin rgyu ba yi/ /dur khrod 'jigs pa che 'di na/ /byis pa ji ltar mi 'jigs shing / /khyod da gcig pu 'di na

'dug /de nas khye'u des sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ma mchis pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug su zhig 'jigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba'i mchog /ji

ltar 'dir mchis las gang lags/ /bdag gcig bdag gis gang ma mchis/ /bdag kyang gang gi'ang ma lags te/ /bdag ni su'i lags de ma mthong / /bdag gi su lags de ma mthong / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngon cad

sdig pa byas pa'i las/ /de yi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/ /khang pa stong pa 'dir bor nas/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong ba yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ gau tam khang stong snyam pa yi/ /'du shes da dung mnga' ba blta/ /byang chub snying por khyod bzhugs nas/ /'du shes

yongs su ma mkhyen tam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ngas ni 'du shes yongs shes te/ /nga la 'du shes yod ma yin/ /khyod nyid la ni snying brtse bas/ /khang pa stong pa 'dir 'ongs so/ /khye'us gsol pa/ sems can dag ni bar 'ga' yang / /gang

tshe shin tu mi dmigs pa/ /de tshe thugs rje gang du byung / /khyod ni su la thugs brtse mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bdag med zhi ba stong pa nyid/ /sems can 'di dag mi shes te/ /de dag nyid la snying brtse'i phyir/ /bsod nams spyad pa spyod pa

yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ stong pa zhi bar thugs chud nas/ /zhi ba stong pa nyid mkhyen kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du/ /phyin ci log kyang ma spangs sam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /zhi ba stong pa nyid rtogs nas/ /sems can yongs su

smin bya'i phyir/ /'dren pa chos ston mdzad pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du/ /khyod kyis phyin ci log ma spangs/ /sems can 'du shes ma mchis na/ /thugs rje gang du skye bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /byang chub sems ni rab bzung nas/ /yod min sems can rnams la yang / /mi mchog rnams ni go gyon pa/ /rang byung rnams kyis byin rlabs so/ /khye'us gsol pa/ dngos po gang na'ang mi dmigs pas/ /go cha thams cad pa lags/ /

dngos po ma mchis chos rnams la/ /go cha dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /chos rnams dngos po yod min yang / /srog chags rnams la chos ston 'di/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi/ /thugs rjes rnam par rol pa yin/ /

khye'us gsol pa/ chos ni yi ge ma mchis na/ /bshad pa gud na ga la mchis/ /'jig rten rnams la slu mdzad dam/ /chos ma lags pa chos bshad dam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nga ni 'jig rten slu ma yin/ /chos ma yin pa'ang nga mi smra/ /

phyin ci log gyur sems can gyi/ /nyon mongs sel bar nga byed do/ /khye'us gsol pa/ nyon mongs rtsa ba ma mchis te/ /nang ngam phyi rol rnams na yang / /de dag rnams kyi gnas ma mchis/ /nyon mongs ji ltar rnam par sbyang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /

phyin ci log las byung ba rnams/ /yongs su brtags las skyes pa ste/ /rtog pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /khye'us gsol pa/ rnam brtag mang po ci 'tshal te/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing / /de la nyon mongs mi 'byung ste/ /

nams kyang nyon mongs de mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ /sems ni rtag tu 'od gsal kyang / /blo bur nye ba'i nyon mongs kyis/ /so so'i skye bo nyon mongs 'gyur/ /khye'us gsol pa/ nyon mongs dmigs su ma mchis

te/ /de dag phyogs na mi gnas na/ /blo bur du ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /de zhus bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dper na sprin rnams bar snang la/ /snang yang de dag de bzhin min/ /nyon mongs 'byung ba'ang de 'dra ste/ /snang yang de dag

de bzhin min/ /khye'us gsol pa/ ma nor de bzhin gang lags pa/ /chos gnas nyid de chos nyid do/ /ma nor de bzhin nyid chos la/ /nor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /byis pa 'du shes ldan rnams kyis/ /log par rnam par

gang brtags pa/ /blo de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ skye ma mchis pas rab phye ba/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhig byung / /skye ba ma mchis chos rnams la/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba

'thad ma lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /skye ba med par skye ba ni/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan/ /kun rdzob tha snyad btags pa ste/ /dam pa'i don du yod ma yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ da dung khyod la don dam dang / /kun rdzob 'du shes

gnyis mnga' ste/ /theg pa gcig lam 'gal 'gyur ba/ /gau tam khyod kyis bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nga ni lam dang 'gal mi byed/ /'gal ba med par nga gnas te/ /mi 'thun sems can sdums kyang byed/ /khye'u khyod de

ltar shes par gyis/ /khye'us gsol pa/ sems can de ni mi dmigs na/ /gau ta ma khyod ci sdums mdzad/ /chos rnams sngon gyi mtha' la gzigs/ /gang gi kun nas nyon mongs skye/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha'

dang / /de bzhin da ltar byung ba dang / /byang chub dam pa rtogs gyur nas/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /khye'us gsol pa/ rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes sgrogs mdzad cing / /nyid kyi mkhyen pa sgrogs mdzad de/ /'di ltar bdag tu sgro 'dogs pas/ /khyod ni lhag

pa'i nga rgyal che/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nga ni bdag la mi stod de/ /de bzhin gzhan la brnyas mi byed/ /de bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston/ /des na de bzhin gshegs zhes bya/ /khye'us gsol pa/ brjod du ma mchis de bzhin nyid/ /de na de nyid ma mchis

na/ /sgra skad ma mchis sgra bshad pa/ /mkhyen bzhin log par bka' ma stsal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /chos de thams cad log pa ste/ /de bzhin nyid las byung ba yin/ /de bzhin nyid ni rtogs pas na/ /nga la skyon med yon tan med/ /khye'us gsol pa/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin na/ /bdag gi spobs pa 'di skyes te/ /'di 'dra'i lan dag gang gsol pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bzod par gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can chos gos kyi nang nas phyung ste/ khye'u de'i

logs su brkyang ba dang / de nas khye'u des bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi sor mo la bzung ste langs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de khang stong nas bsnams te/ srang du bzhag pa dang / de na skye bo phal po che dag 'di ltar khye'u 'di 'di kho na ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang /

bdag nyid chen po'i chos 'di lta bu'i lan 'debs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ngo mtshar to snyam nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khye'u khyod kyi las

kyi sgrib pa zad kyis/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par gyis la skye bo'i tshogs chen po la yang shes par gyis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston cig /de nas khye'u de sa las mi bdun srid tsam du 'phags nas lus las 'od phyung ste/ 'od des mnyan yod thams cad dang / 'dzam

bu'i gling thams cad snang ba chen po rgyas par gyur to/ /'od des brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa lha brgya stong mang po gzhan dag la yang yang dag par bskul bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der

song ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i me tog dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'od kyis snang

bar bgyis nas/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyis so/ /zhes ched du rjod pa de skad ched du brjod de/ de ltar khye'u de'i ming snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khye'u 'di snang ba

bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar gyur cig ces/ khye'u de'i ming la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bar snang de las babs te/ sa la 'dug pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa

bas 'di lta ste dper na/ grogs po lo brgyad lon pa'i lus gzugs yongs su grub par gyur pa de 'dra bar 'dug go/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la lha'i ras bcos bu zung cig byin te/ kye khye'u nga la snying brtse ba'i phyir ras bcos bu'i zung 'di gyon la gcer bur ma

'dug shig /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gos kyi rgyan bgos pas mdzes pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi rgyan thogs na mdzes so/ /kau shi ka

de lta mod kyi 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan gang dag yin pa de dag nyon cig /byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ byang chub kyi snying por brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i rgyan ni byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ sems can thams cad mngon du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dam bcas pa brten pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi

rgyan te/ sgyu dang g.yo sel bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ thams cad las khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur

ro/ /nga rgyal med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud

med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul

khrims yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa dang des pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro dang sgra skad lta bu'i tshig tu 'gyur ro/ /dam bcas pa brtan zhing
